verses.1: Topa aw, ka lungkham mahmahna panin nang tungah kong kiko hi.
verses.2: Topa aw, ka aw hong za in. Ka thumna awgingte hong ngai in.
verses.3: Topa aw, nangmah in mawhneite ciamteh lecin, Topa aw, kua in thuak zo ding ahi hiam?
verses.4: Ahih hangin nangmah hong kizahtak theih nadingin nangmah in mawhna na maisak hi.
verses.5: Topaʼ hong huh ding lawpna tawh ka ngak a, ama thugen ka muang hi.
verses.6: Galvilte in zingsang hun ding a ngaklah sangin galvilte in phalvak hun ding a ngaklah sangin, Topa ka ngaklah zaw hi.
verses.7: Israel aw, Topa muang in. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topaʼ itna kip tawntungin, hong hon khia nuam tawntung hi.
verses.8: Mawhna a om khempeuh panin amah in Israel-te a hon khia ding hi.
